name: Bot invasion
description:
The building of the tech company Detroid Droids has been taken over by a rogue ai that calls itself "Corrupt Justice."
The ai is currently contained within the building but nobody knows how long they can hold them in there.
Nobody can get into the building so Detroid Droids hired you, a skilled hacker, to hack one of the robots and stop Corrupt Justice from spreading to the outside.

Controls:
WASD to move
Mouse to aim
Spacebar to shoot
E to open doors
ESC to pause

Credit:

Sem Boekenoogen

Programmed by:

Font used:

This game was made for a school project.
